mapper.select: SELECT zss.id, zss.create_by, zss.create_time, zss.update_by, zss.update_time, zss.del_flag, zss.sort_num, zss.name, zss.code, zss.description, zss.seq_type, zss.supplement_flag, zss.supplement_num, zss.prefix, zss.suffix FROM z_sys_seq zss ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT zss.id, zss.create_by, zss.create_time, zss.update_by, zss.update_time, zss.del_flag, zss.sort_num, zss.name, zss.code, zss.description, zss.seq_type, zss.supplement_flag, zss.supplement_num, zss.prefix, zss.suffix FROM z_sys_seq zss ${ew.customSqlSegment}
